com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context.impl

Class XmlInfinitumOrmContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context.impl.XmlInfinitumOrmContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfinitumContext, BeanProvider, InfinitumOrmContext

    public class XmlInfinitumOrmContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements InfinitumOrmContext

    Implementation of InfinitumOrmContext which is initialized through XML as a child of an XmlApplicationContext instance.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 12/23/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context.InfinitumOrmContext

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XmlInfinitumOrmContext(XmlApplicationContext parentContext)
      Creates a new XmlInfinitumOrmContext instance as a child of the given XmlApplicationContext.

      • getConfigurationMode

        public InfinitumOrmContext.ConfigurationMode getConfigurationMode()
        Description copied from interface: InfinitumOrmContext
        Returns the InfinitumOrmContext.ConfigurationMode value of this InfinitumContext, indicating which style of configuration this application is using, XML- or annotation-based. An XML configuration means that domain model mappings are provided through XML mapping files, while an annotation configuration means that mappings and other properties are provided in source code using Java annotations.
        Specified by:
        getConfigurationMode in interface InfinitumOrmContext
        Returns:
        ConfigurationMode for this application

      • hasSqliteDb

        public boolean hasSqliteDb()
        Description copied from interface: InfinitumOrmContext
        Returns true if there is a SQLite database configured or false if not. If infinitum.cfg.xml is missing the sqlite element, this will be false.
        Specified by:
        hasSqliteDb in interface InfinitumOrmContext
        Returns:
        true if a SQLite database is configured or false if not
